attributes.name: Premium Payment Term
attributes.description: The period for which premiums must be paid for the policy

attributes.name: Policy Term
attributes.description: Total duration of the life insurance coverage

attributes.name: Investment Amount
attributes.description: Amount invested in a non-term life insurance policy

attributes.name: Income Period
attributes.description: The duration for which periodic payments are made to the beneficiary

attributes.name: Income
attributes.description: Regular payout received from the policy

attributes.name: Selected Funds/Strategy
attributes.description: The schemes where premiums are allocated in unit-linked plans

attributes.name: Life Cover/Death Benefit
attributes.description: The guaranteed amount payable in case of the insured's demise

attributes.name: Cover Upto Age
attributes.description: Maximum age till which the policy provides coverage

attributes.name: Payout Options
attributes.description: Various methods available for receiving policy benefits

attributes.name: selectedRider
attributes.description: Optional additional coverage chosen with the life insurance policy

attributes.name: Inception Year
attributes.description: The year the life insurance company was established

attributes.name: Claim Settlement Ratio
attributes.description: Percentage of death claims settled by the insurer

attributes.name: Solvency Ratio
attributes.description: Size of its capital against the all risk the insurance company has taken. Indicator of an insurer's ability to meet its obligations

attributes.name: Number Of Lives Insured
attributes.description: Count of individuals covered under the policy

attributes.name: Asset Under Management
attributes.description: Total value of assets managed by the insurer

attributes.name: Branches Across India
attributes.description: Number of branches operational nationwide
